views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11. Mainly for iPad which has different wallpaper layout when device rotated. You can choose albums for landscape and portrait in which photos can be set as wallpaper.

Due to the animate problem, at present it only can set the same wallpaper for lock screen and home screen. If somebody has good solution, please make a pull request to me :)

fix safe mode bug
improve the animate when change the wallpaper


support iOS 11.3.1
fix the animate bug in iOS 10 and higher
